editorialNotes.standard: Streamlined squad play, smooth touch controls, and thrilling extractions bring this classic action franchise into the modern age.

We wouldn’t be surprised if Subway Surfers kept its spot near the top of the charts for decades to come. Its heart is the key to its stamina, revealed in loving details lavished on cities from Chicago to Shenzhen in its World Tours or in the lovable ruffians awarded in its frequent events. It’s a cinch to pick up, but we’re still finding new ways to master it years and miles later.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It's hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile. Over time the build, train, and attack gameplay has been honed to perfection through fantastic updates. We still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught, and to experience the rush of victory after our carefully assembled attack force yet again smashed through enemy defenses.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone’s suspicious in Among Us!, a fascinating multiplayer game set aboard a damaged spaceship. Whether you’re a Crewmate making quick repairs or an Impostor taking out key systems (and unsuspecting players), each match is a riveting mystery. And a hilarious one, especially when smart accusations or sly misdirection sway who gets voted off the ship. It’s a test of wits anyone can enjoy.
editorialNotes.short: Customize your look with Halloween-themed hats.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.

name: Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, it’s an experience you’ll happily lose yourself in.

ios.subtitle: Play a star in soccer games!

editorialNotes.standard: Be the last player standing in this incredible mobile take on the blockbuster battle royale, which goes above and beyond with deep customizability and cutting-edge graphics.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: A fast and frantic battle royale
editorialNotes.standard: Survive the fierce battle for victory.
editorialNotes.short: Survive the fierce battle for victory.

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?

editorialNotes.standard: This action-packed sequel hits its mark thanks to a quiver full of tweaks, including faster battles, PvP matches, and fantastic new skills to discover.

editorialNotes.tagline: What goes up, must come down

ios.subtitle: Grow the biggest in the game!

editorialNotes.standard: Always wanted to be a soccer star? Score! Hero puts you in the kit of a young upstart, making your way to bigger and better clubs. The controls couldn’t be simpler—simply draw a line where you want the ball to go, and let the action unfold. While the gameplay is easy to learn, Score! Hero also shines with depth, rewarding thoughtful passes and smart shots over wild swiping.

ios.subtitle: Kill the dead to stop Doomsday

editorialNotes.standard: Adventure across a modern cityscape filled with raids, dungeons, and lots of monsters in this gorgeous action RPG based on the popular webtoon.

ios.subtitle: Cut a watermelon in one slice!

editorialNotes.short: Slice and dice in exciting arcade challenges.

ios.subtitle: Race and drive uphill to win!

name: Merge Fighting Games
artistName: Kolorlife Automatic Technology Joint Stock Company

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: With exciting events, famous characters, and wild courses, Nintendo's legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Kill time with this classic arcade game on your wrist.

name: Raid Rush: Tower Defense TD
artistName: Panteon Yazilim Oyun Egitim Teknolojileri ve Hizmetleri Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Take your game to the max

name: Level Devil - NOT A Troll Game

editorialNotes.tagline: You’ll have to learn through failure
editorialNotes.standard: In this entrancing game of skill and spatial awareness, you lob spheres to clear a path through abstract environments, tapping into our innate fascination of watching virtual objects crumble apart. Part reflex challenge, part hypnotic journey across a strange, striking landscape, Smash Hit is a riveting experience.

editorialNotes.tagline: Don't worry about winning, just don't die
editorialNotes.standard: Death’s never been funnier. Funny enough that when we die while poking a bear or wiring house lights, we’re as happy as when we live. Win or lose, these clever, cartoonish mini-games make survival an irresistible challenge.

We’re blown away by the newest installment of EA’s popular racing franchise. We found ourselves gawking at reflections, lens flare, and scenery as we motored through hairpin turns at breakneck speeds. The improvements aren't just cosmetic, though—you'll find yourself stunned by the believable roars of engines and the huge variety of true-to-life cars and courses. RR3 also packs great new gameplay features like Time Shifted Multiplayer, which allows us to race asynchronously against friends in fierce tests of driving prowess.

ios.subtitle: Beat your boss & kick the jerk

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Control Mario with just a tap!

editorialNotes.standard: He's here! We're all about pulling off stylish moves with a single tap, thanks to super-simple, one-touch controls. But collecting all the pink coins? That takes skill. With tons of unlocks (including Luigi!), you’ll be playing this one long after you reach the final flagpole.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Star Wars and toys go together like Wookiees and smugglers, but rarely so well as they do in these classic LEGO adventures. They’re all here—the most beloved characters, settings, and vehicles from the first six films, lovingly translated into plastic bricks for a wacky reenactment of George Lucas’s epic space odyssey. Thanks to instantly accessible controls and hours of action-packed gameplay, fans of all ages can jump in and relive their favorite scenes.

The ocean’s your preyground and you’ve gotta keep feeding in this deliciously goofy arcade romp. Rushing from meal to meal—fishes, birds, hapless beachgoers—keeps the pace exhilarating, and the gorgeous environments are a feast for your eyes. Meanwhile, random hazards (mines, pollution, bigger sharks) add a thrilling sense of danger—reminding you that you’re not the only predator in these waters.
